To test if the todo APIs requests are working.

POST:
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST -d '{"title": "Hello from Post", "body": "Learning about this API thing"}' http://localhost:5000/critterpedia-helper/us-central1/api/todo

DELETE:
curl -X DELETE http://localhost:5000/critterpedia-helper/us-central1/api/todo/<todoId>

PUT:
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X PUT -d '{"title": "Hello from Post edit", "body": "Learning about this API thing2"}' http://localhost:5000/critterpedia-helper/us-central1/api/todo/<todoId>
